result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Activity: Arraignment
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

2:17 PM Defendant Anthony Jose Lopez appeared by video.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Anthony Jose Lopez.  Prosecuting attorney Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Victim C.H. appeared by video. Information filed, copy to Defendant's attorney, reading waived. Defendant's attorney stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set. Parties argue bond. Court denies motion to modify bond. Bond to continue.
Arraignment on October 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: C Jim Fitzgerald
Adjourned initial appearance on September 9, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Activity: Initial Appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:25 PM Defendant Anthony Jose Lopez appeared by video, in custody at the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Anthony Jose Lopez.  Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Court orders $2500 cash bond with conditions: Defendant may have no contact with C.J.H., home, vehicle, work; no possession of drug paraphernalia, no possession of illegal substances without a valid prescription and Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety. Defendant may have a one time civil stand-by to retrieve personal possessions from residence.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

ADDRESS INFO for Anthony Jose Lopez
Current: 904 Cardinal Lane, Janesville, WI 53545 United States  (Effective: 08-29-2022)
Prior: 5432 Hermitage Ave., Chicago, IL 60609

No contact directly or indirectly with victim CJH, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. 1 time visit with police to get belongings with permission from victim and Northern Town Motel. Absolute sobriety.  Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. REFUSED TO SIGN.
